name: Affiliate Reviews
author: WPchop

sections.description:
If you’re looking to boost your affiliate marketing efforts on your WordPress site, look no further. Affiliate Reviews allows you to easily create engaging and effective affiliate content using custom blocks that are tailored specifically to your needs. Whether you want to showcase products, casinos, games, forex, etc our plugin makes it easy to generate professional-looking affiliate content that resonates with your audience. And with our visual settings section, you can customize the look and feel of your blocks to match your site’s theme and branding, ensuring a cohesive and polished look across your entire site.

Demos

  • Electronics Affiliate Demo
  • Casino Affiliate Demo

(Both sites use UniBlock theme.)

Features

  • üåü Reviews Custom Post Type: Create your reviews inside this post type and choose if you want to use it in the front or use it only as a data store and create pages for your reviews.
  • üöÄ Optimized for Speed: All the blocks are speed optimized and if it is used with good block theme you can achieve perfect Google PageSpeed scores. (You can check our demos as an example)
  • üé® Customizable Block Styles: You will find Visual Settings and you can adjust the style of the blocks in order to blend nicely with your active theme.
  • ‚úÖ 7 Custom Affiliate Blocks: You can build a complete affiliate review site without any external dependencies.
  • ‚öôÔ∏è Versatile: The plugin can be used for almost any affiliate project regardless the type (casino,products,forex,etc).
  • üñºÔ∏è 3 Available Thumbnail Styles: Because every project is unique, we included three different thumbnail styles for every need.
  • üéöÔ∏è Easily Adjustable: Each block has extended individual settings using Gutenberg components.
  • üëâ Theme Compatibility: The plugin is compatible with almost any block/FSE theme available.
sections.installation:
From zip file
1. Upload zip folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

From Plugins search screen
1. Go to Plugins -> Add New
2. Search for “Affiliate Reviews”
3. Click “Install” and “Activate”
sections.changelog:
1.0.6

  • Small fixes about ratings and translations

1.0.5

  • New options for affiliate buttons for padding, font weight and font size
  • Small CSS improvements
  • New tags functionality for tables and grid

1.0.4

  • Improved experience when no reviews available and block previews not working
  • Bump @wordpress/scripts to the latest version

1.0.3

  • New option in Affiliate Grid Block to hide pros list
  • Thumbnails now have review link if available
  • Bug fix: Affiliate Grid Block missing background color

1.0.2

  • Bug fix: Issue when the same block was used more than once on the same page

1.0.1

  • README.md updates
  • Blocks category added
  • Updates to blocks titles and descriptions

1.0.0

  • Initial version

short_description: Custom affiliate blocks for your product, casino, forex affiliate site, using your favorite theme!

screenshots.caption: Grid block inside editor with settings.

affreviews/grid.name: affreviews/grid
affreviews/grid.title: Reviews Grid
affreviews/grid.description: Affiliate list in a grid layout with extended settings for various use cases.

affreviews/single-large.name: affreviews/single-large
affreviews/single-large.title: Single Review Large
affreviews/single-large.description: Display a single review with all the available information inside reviews or pages.

affreviews/info-list.name: affreviews/info-list
affreviews/info-list.title: Review Info List
affreviews/info-list.description: List with all the review information. Can be used inside a review or in any page.

affreviews/table-large.name: affreviews/table-large
affreviews/table-large.title: Reviews Table Large
affreviews/table-large.description: Display a list of reviews in a table layout with more information inside each review row.

affreviews/single.name: affreviews/single
affreviews/single.title: Single Review
affreviews/single.description: Display a single review inside reviews or pages.

affreviews/table.name: affreviews/table
affreviews/table.title: Reviews Table
affreviews/table.description: Display a list of reviews in a table layout with extended settings.

affreviews/pros-cons.name: affreviews/pros-cons
affreviews/pros-cons.title: Review Positives - Negatives
affreviews/pros-cons.description: Display positives and negatives of a review in a list format.
